content: Add NumericRange enum to format_knowledge.rs

Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt and fix errors for constructor updates

Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix all clippy issues following warning rules
Add EnumVariant variant to FormatKnowledgeKey enum
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt and fix errors for enum variant

Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt and fix errors for resolve method
Update find_example_value_for_type with iterator-based dispatch (TYPE-SYSTEM-3)
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt and fix errors for iterator dispatch
Add Camera3dDepthLoadOp::Clear knowledge entry to BRP_FORMAT_KNOWLEDGE
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt and fix errors for knowledge entry
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix all final clippy issues following warning rules
Run cargo nextest run
